command.description: The shell command to execute (e.g., 'pnpm build')

skip_ci.description: Whether to skip running this command in CI/CD pipelines

timeout.description: Maximum execution time for the command (e.g., '5m', '1h')

commands.description: Custom commands for linting, testing, formatting, and building

description.description: Brief description of the app's purpose and functionality

domains.description: Domain configurations for accessing this app

env.description: Environment variables specific to this app

monitoring.description: Whether to enable uptime monitoring for this app (defaults to true)

name.description: Unique identifier for the app (lowercase, hyphenated)

path.description: Relative file path to the app's source code directory

terraformManaged.description: Whether this app's infrastructure is managed by Terraform (defaults to true)

title.description: Human-readable app name for display purposes

tools.description: Build tools required for CI/CD workflows

usesNPM.description: Whether this app should be included in the pnpm workspace (auto-detected if not set)

iconUrl.description: URL to the project's icon/favicon image (used for status pages)

logoUrl.description: URL to the project's logo image

primaryColour.description: Primary brand colour in hex format (e.g., #3B82F6)

secondaryColour.description: Secondary brand colour in hex format (e.g., #10B981)

dockerfile.description: Path to the Dockerfile relative to the app directory

port.description: Port number the app listens on inside the container

release.description: Whether to build and release this app in CI/CD (defaults to true)

wildcard.description: Whether this is a wildcard domain (e.g., '*.example.com')

zone.description: DNS zone for the domain if different from default

source.description: Source type for the variable value (value, resource, sops)

value.description: The value or reference for this variable (format depends on source type)

default.description: Environment variables that apply to all environments (dev, staging, production)

dev.description: Environment variables specific to the development environment

production.description: Environment variables specific to the production environment

staging.description: Environment variables specific to the staging environment

owner.description: GitHub username or organisation that owns the repository

brand.description: Branding configuration for the project including colours and logo

description.description: Brief description of the project's purpose and functionality

monitoring.description: Monitoring configuration including status page and custom monitors

name.description: Unique identifier for the project (lowercase, hyphenated)

repo.description: GitHub repository information for the project

title.description: Human-readable project name displayed in documentation and UIs

config.description: Provider-specific resource configuration (e.g., size, region, version)

description.description: Brief description of the resource's purpose and functionality

monitoring.description: Whether to enable uptime monitoring for this resource (defaults to true)

name.description: Unique identifier for the resource (used in environment variable references)

provider.description: Cloud provider hosting this resource (digitalocean, hetzner, backblaze, turso)

terraformManaged.description: Whether this resource is managed by Terraform (defaults to true)

title.description: Human-readable resource name for display purposes

type.description: Type of resource to provision (postgres, s3, sqlite)

enabled.description: Whether to enable automated backups for this resource

env.description: Environment variables shared across all apps

domain.description: Custom domain for the status page (e.g., status.example.com). If not set, Terraform will not configure a custom domain.

description: Schema for webkit app.json configuration files

$schema.description: JSON Schema reference for IDE validation and autocomplete

apps.description: Application definitions for all apps in the project

project.description: Project metadata including name, title, and repository information

resources.description: Infrastructure resources such as databases and storage buckets

shared.description: Shared configuration that applies to all apps

webkit_version.description: The version of webkit used to generate this configuration

title: WebKit App Definition
